name: discoverable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
possible to find or discover: Perhaps a clue to his death was discoverable from his activities that day.
internet & telecoms
  specialized easy to find on a website, using a search engine, etc.: A discoverable website helps learners follow their creativity rather than a prescribed path.
law
  specialized Discoverable information or documents must be made available by one side in a legal case to the other side: Some information may not be discoverable, either because it is not relevant to the case or is classified. discoverable evidence
